name: Fantastic World (Brandocean)
description:
Description of the game

Fantastic world is a Platformer game where you can defeat monsters like slimes and golems with guns that would try to kill you but you also have a gun so you can kill them. Your mission: save your beloved.

Instructions to download

To download this game you need to have "GameMaker Studio 2" then open the file and press F5 to play the game.

Important!

Controls and more information are in the script named "Readme"
